story_galar_02_04000/2401_1001_0100_10: Oh? Well, well, if it isn’t Leon.
story_galar_02_04000/2401_1001_0200_10: Don’t you have an event you need to attend?
story_galar_02_04000/2401_1001_0300_10: Chairman Rose! And you all are...
story_galar_02_04000/2401_1001_0700_10: They’re here to, ah, collaborate with me.
story_galar_02_04000/2401_1001_0800_10:
With help from their excellent young talent, I plan
to use sync stone energy more effectively.
story_galar_02_04000/2401_1001_1000_10: You all seem to misunderstand me.
story_galar_02_04000/2401_1001_1100_10: I don’t intend to limit sync stones’ potential.
story_galar_02_04000/2401_1001_1300_10: In fact, I have a question for you all.
story_galar_02_04000/2401_1001_1400_10:
The potential of people and Pokémon...or our
energy problem...
story_galar_02_04000/2401_1001_1500_10: Which do you believe we should prioritize?
